results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 7bb8c7bdf8b64c6a8514a01f431833e3. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests covering login with special characters.

results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 1c5d2bec991b4245b4c10348ad792fb1:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
